plot: Using no dialogue and with a lyrical score, this sweet film shows a weekend in the life of a young family with a small boy and his determined quest for a pet.
title: Subbota i voskreseniye
plot_es: Using no dialogue and with a lyrical score, this sweet film shows a weekend in the life of a young family with a small boy and his determined quest for a pet.
